title: Grandfather Stone feat. Diane Rehm, Jonathan Joss
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jonathan Joss (Comanche Moon, Parks and Recreation) and NPR’s Diane Rehm (The Diane Rehm Show, On My Mind) star in this Seneca tale about a mystical stone who introduces the first stories to the world.
itunes:author: WBUR
